Statute.Title: Use of French in Federally Regulated Private Businesses Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Usage du français au sein des entreprises privées de compétence fédérale, Loi sur l’)

Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 42 as enacted by s. 54 of An Act for the Substantive Equality of Canada’s Official Languages, in force on a day to be fixed by the Governor in Council see s. 71(4) — Not in Force
— ss. 55 to 57.1, sub. 58(1), 59 (1) to (3) and (5) and ss. 60 to 63 comes into force on the second anniversary of the day fixed under ss. 71(4) see s. 71(5) — Not in Force
— ss. 58(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(6) — Not in Force
— ss. 59(4) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71(7) — Not in Force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 17, s. 260 in force on assent 20.06.2024
